complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the Plugin Documentation and User Guide task into 5 subtasks covering: 1) README.md and installation documentation, 2) Admin help tabs implementation using WordPress contextual help API, 3) In-plugin onboarding wizard for first-time setup, 4) Comprehensive user guide PDF creation, and 5) Video tutorials and tooltips implementation. For each subtask, include specific requirements, implementation details, and testing criteria.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves multiple documentation formats (README, help tabs, PDF guide, onboarding wizard) requiring both technical implementation and content creation. The complexity comes from needing to implement WordPress-specific APIs for help tabs, creating an interactive onboarding wizard, generating comprehensive documentation, and ensuring everything is accurate and user-friendly. The task requires both coding skills for the WordPress integration and technical writing skills for the documentation content.
